name: @eunjae/things-cli
description: Command-line interface for Things 3 task management app

scripts.bump: npm version patch && npm install && git add package-lock.json && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm install && git add package-lock.json && git commit --amend --no-edit
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm install && git add package-lock.json && git commit --amend --no-edit

author: eunjae
